Configuration.StudyNameEntrez: Genetic Variation and Signatures of Natural Selection in Diverse Africans

Configuration.Description: Our study identified candidate regions of genome involved in adaptation and identified regions associated with selected phenotypes.
Configuration.StudyInEx: We included unrelated individuals living in Cameroon and Ethiopia.
